# Count publications in bib file
if (file.exists("manuscripts.bib")) {
  bib_content <- readLines("manuscripts.bib", warn = FALSE)
  n_entries <- sum(grepl("^@", bib_content))
  cat(paste0("*Complete list of ", n_entries, " publications*\n\n"))
}
